activities.name: copy data from Data Lake to Delta Lake
copy data from Delta Lake to Data Lake Staging

dependsOn.activity: copy data from Data Lake to Delta Lake

activities.name: copy data from Data Lake to Delta Lake
copy data from Data Lake to Delta Lake

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	filename as string,
	keyfield as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['/Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/rawzone/input','Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/rawzone/processed'],
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'ukgdatalakefspoc',
	folderPath: 'Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/rawzone/input',
	fileName: (concat($filename,'.csv')),
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> sourceRawZone
sourceRawZone alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'ukgdatalakefspoc',
	folderPath: (concat('Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/delta/',$filename)),
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:[($keyfield)],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	filename as string,
	keyfield as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/rawzone/input','Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/rawzone/processed'],
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[(concat('/Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/rawzone/input/',$filename,'/',$filename,'*'))]) ~> sourceRawZone
sourceRawZone alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'ukgdatalakefspoc',
	folderPath: (concat('Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/delta/',$filename)),
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:[($keyfield)],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	filename as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'ukgdatalakefspoc',
	folderPath: (concat('Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/delta/',$filename))) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'ukgdatalakefspoc',
	folderPath: (concat('Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/staging/',$filename)),
	truncate: true,
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
